name: Middle East Drift
description:
Imagine yourself in the middle of the desert. There’s not much to do except stay safe, cool, and hydrated. Still, you long for a drift.

Here’s were Middle East Drift comes in. First, pick a car you can afford – a sports car or an SUV, whatever it takes to get your adrenaline running.

Choose a location and start your journey. Drive and drift using the on-screen arrows. The clock is ticking. Pause at any time to rethink your strategy and get the most points.

Gain Drift Points as you move through the course. Didn’t reach your goal? That’s okay. Just restart and up your game the next time.

Middle East Drift is a challenge to meet your point goals. Cool, sharp graphics make the game fun and challenging. If you thought a desert has nothing to do, then this game will change your perceptions forever!
